topic.title: My cousin will reveal who He is! That's the real truth about Bitcoin creator.
topic.body:
https://satoshinrh.com/

Who is your God now Craig Wright? #faketoshi

What about the next?

1561820909_16GG19wZtGAcebcKhf2hEmcf1sETi.body: It is clear they are storing and scanning the content of all files, that's why they don't enable end-to-end encryption by default.

1566158607_1D7oqjJnnaxiFti8Kk3qQQx76L2v9.body:
> [filips](#comment_146_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): Or at least sign a message with original private key containing current date (to prevent just copying real old signatures).

For real he could sign one of the addresses that belong to him. 
If the article started with just one signature, it could get everyone attention, but the guy prefer to make a circus with a marketing company behind.

> [a7eec](#comment_3_19nmLTEGX8iQPtCSwQ9TnSDVJRxCBgFpSy): at this point if satoshi isn't a nwo sea person who will bring the second comming of Christ i will be disappointed

could be hal finney ressurected by AI and enclosed on a simulacro, but...
